Articles.Content:
I actually prefer historic mode now. My record so far is over 5000 silver in one go, with a comparable amount of exp for it. That was the debut of my Ju87, which anhilated two heavy tanks before going down.

Arcade mode still tends to crash me, although I do run that too now that I have figured out how to not let my computer lock up all the time.

Maybe when I get done running errands I'll get a squad together for some fun.

Tried both, they each have their good and bad points. I prefer to stay neutral in arguments as not to have someone kill me for disagreeing with them.

What level are you at now Odin?
The only reason I don't play historic mode is because roll for no reason at low altitudes.

The only reason I don't play historic mode is because roll for no reason at low altitudes.

It's a good thing. Learn to servo hunt your roll control so that you can respond much faster to incoming fire.

Currently level 4 overall.

America 2, Germany 3, Russia 0, Britian 0, Japan 1

It's a good thing. Learn to servo hunt your roll control so that you can respond much faster to incoming fire.

Currently level 4 overall.

America 2, Germany 3, Russia 0, Britian 0, Japan 1

Can you say that in a way normal people can understand?

also hase everyone seen this video

Yak-15 AHMAGAWD! <3

I had not seen it, thank you very much for the link. Quite nice to see the planes they're adding, especially as one of my favourites, Yak-15, is with!
How did you get the link to work? I posted it before but it didn't work. Wonder what other aircraft they will release.
I went to the youtube page, copied, the url, then pasted it on the insert video thingy.
there needs to be more british bombers

Username: madspy

Favourite plane (in war thunder) : Beaufighter Mk X (8 rockets)

Favourite plane: Meteor F.3

there needs to be more british bombers

There are more British bombers planned

Having some more 4 engine bombers would be nice like including the Halifax.
With some luck, they'll get around to adding the Sukhoi PAK FA as well.
To prove the superiority of Russian engineering, of course.
does anyone use the catalina? (USA) what is it like? because i just looked and i fits what i want in a bomber perfectly so im going to try it now
Catalina isn't very good in my opinion. Some think it is good but ehh... Well. It isn't. It is a massive target and.... Not enough bombs
If you want to test fly it, the Soviets have a premium version that you can try out.

Catalina isn't very good in my opinion. Some think it is good but ehh... Well. It isn't. It is a massive target and.... Not enough bombs

16 isnt enough? (im currently starting the american tree)

i also dont want to spend money
Don't need to buy it to test it. Just find it on the tech tree. Then click test fly.
I love doing that, test flying as many aircraft as I can
i wont let me test fly them?
You can test fly the premium aircraft that cost the golden eagles. Look at the Russian premium aircraft and try test-flying the Catalina there.
ohhhhv .

Username: Erain_Angren

I have no particular favorite plane at the moment. I just like to fly around in Historical Battle with whatever plane suits my mood. Be it fighter or bomber.

A few weeks ago I coincidentally was on the same team with TouhouTorpedo.

Here are three youtubers that are worth checking out:

The Mighty Jingles, Krebs and Bismarck.

does anyone use the Catalina? (USA) what is it like? because i just looked and i fits what i want in a bomber perfectly so I'm going to try it now

Yeah I just replace my Cat with a B-25, but yes it isn't the greatest it is slow, but it has enough bombs/turrets to do fair damage, and its a damage sponge most of the time(which is good cause you ain't running away), as well as fair control response, I really liked it maybe you will to!
